name: Samurai Duel
description:
Slash or be slashed. That's all there is to it.
Find the right moment and strike your opponent.

斬るか斬られるか。ただそれだけだ。
間合いを見極め、相手を一刀両断しろ。

How To Play

Use the mouse and keyboard or gamepad. (See "How to play" in the game for details.)

Mouse
  • UI operation
Keyboard
  • W, A or arrow keys: Move
  • Space: Attack
Gamepad
  • Left stick: Move
  • Button South: Attack
Note

This game is currently under development but is almost completely playable.
If many people play this game, I will implement the following items additionally.

  • Different graphics for each opponent
  • Additional opponents
